DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient has received prior systemic steroid treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to prior steroid therapy administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Treatment with corticosteroid drugs to reduce swelling, pain, and other symptoms of inflammation.

Concepts.definition: The use of exogenous steroids for the treatment of any disease or disorder.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did Patient Receive Steroids Prior to Procurement
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did Patient Receive Steroids Prior to Procurement

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any pharmacologic doses of systemic steroid <=7 days of study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current treatment with systemic steroid therapy (inhaled/topical steroids are acceptable).  Systemic corticosteroids discontinued for at least 30 days prior to first CYT107 injection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Steroid therapy, or steroid therapy with more than 7 consecutive days of steroids within the prior 4 weeks. The use of prednisone or equivalent <0.125 mg/kg/day (absolute maximum of 10 mg/day) as replacement therapy is permitted. Inhaled or topical corticosteroids are permitted.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was steroid therapy initiated prior to enrollment on study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has not used steroids for at least 7 days prior to trial treatment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received pharmacologic doses of systemic steroids within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive greater than 48 hours of oral or IV steroids within 4 weeks of diagnosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving systemic steroid therapy or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to Step 2 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been off pharmacologic doses of systemic steroids for at least 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received systemic steroid therapy within 7 days of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on chronic steroid therapy, except replacement therapy at a daily dose of 10mg or less prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on chronic steroid therapy except those on replacment therapy at a daily dose of 10mg or less prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on chronic steroid therapy except those on replacement therapy at a daily dose of 10mg or less prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received high dose steroids in the past 6 weeks?
